thread.title: Kerr says spinal fluid leak is causing his break from the Warriors
thread.title_full: Kerr says spinal fluid leak is causing his break from the Warriors - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Kerr says spinal fluid leak is causing his break from the Warriors
text:
Photo: Jeff Chiu, Associated Press Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr walks after speaking to reporters at the team's practice facility in Oakland, Calif., Thursday, June 18, 2015. The Warriors believe their first title in 40 years could be the first of many more. With their young core signed long-term and MVP Stephen Curry just entering his prime, the Warriors are certainly set up to make several championship runs. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr walks after speaking to...
Ten days after announcing he was taking an indefinite leave of absence to recover from two offseason back surgeries, Warriors head coach Steve Kerr on Sunday clarified his health situation, saying his adverse symptoms have been caused by a spinal fluid leak. Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr walks after speaking to reporters at the team's practice facility in Oakland, Calif., Thursday, June 18, 2015. The Warriors believe their first title in 40 years could be the first of many more. With their young core signed long-term and MVP Stephen Curry just entering his prime, the Warriors are certainly set up to make several championship runs. Ten days after announcing he was taking an indefinite leave of absence to recover from two offseason back surgeries, Warriors head coach Steve Kerr on Sunday clarified his health situation, saying his adverse symptoms have been caused by a spinal fluid leak.
